content: i wanted a lovely lacy bonnet that was fast to knit for my baby girl the lace design is simple and reminds me a bit of lilac flowers the colour helps too the ties are i-cord but if you wanted to skip that you could easily sew some ribbon to the edge instead enjoy now also available in italian thanks to barbara ajroldi 1 for the translation also available in high contrast black and white pdf 1 http //www ravelry com/people/ajroldi
